name: ConfiguratorScreen
desc: The screen for fine-granular configuration of the voice changing.

name: ConfiguratorScreen
desc: Creates a new ConfiguratorScreen instance.

name: CustomThemeData
desc: Object containing design constants for the ReVoiceMe app.

name: defaultBorderRadius
desc: Uniform default size for corner roundness.

name: defaultIconSize
desc: Uniform default size for icons.

name: defaultPadding
desc: Uniform default padding size.

name: drawerHeaderHeight
desc: The height of the drawer header.

name: smallPadding
desc: Uniform small padding size.

name: buildThemeData
desc: The default theme for the ReVoiceMe app.

name: DeviceVolumeSlider
desc: A slider for the device volume.

name: DeviceVolumeSlider
desc: Creates a new DeviceVolumeSlider instance.

name: cleanup
desc:
Cleans up the volume controller listener to free resources.
Pass this method as the 'cleanup' parameter for a RevoiceMeDrawer.
There is always either one or none VolumeController in an app globally registered.
This code is not in the 'dispose' because navigating to a new screen calls the 'dispose' method
of the current screen AFTER the 'initState' of the new screen.
Because all (de-)registrations happen globally and idempotently, the new screen would end up with no VolumeController listener.

name: HomeScreen
desc: The home screen of the ReVoiceMe app.

name: HomeScreen
desc: Creates a new HomeScreen instance.

name: ReVoiceMe
desc: The main widget of the ReVoiceMe app.

name: ReVoiceMe
desc: Creates a new ReVoiceMe instance.

name: NavItem
desc: A navigation item to be used inside a ReVoiceMeDrawer.

name: NavItem
desc: Creates a new NavItem instance.

name: cleanup
desc:
A cleanup method that is called when navigating away from the screen via the item.
It is called before the new screen is built (and before the current screen is disposed).

name: icon
desc: The icon to display left to the routeText.

name: inferTileColor
desc: Infer the color of the tile depending on whether the currenRoute matches the item's route.

name: onTap
desc: Performs cleanup and then starts the navigation to the item's route.

name: route
desc: The route path to navigate to when the item is tapped.

name: routeText
desc: The text to display on the item.

name: PlayButton
desc: A circular button with an icon to toggle voice changing.

name: PlayButton
desc: Creates a new PlayButton instance.

name: inferPlayerColor
desc:
Infer the background color of the player depending on whether
the user is allowed to toggle the related action's state and whether the related action is active.

name: inferPlayerIcon
desc: Infer the icon to show for indicating the related action's state.

name: onPressed
desc:
Function to call when the button is pressed.
Attempts to toggle the voice changing state depending on whether
the user is allowed to toggle the voice changing and whether voice changing is active.

name: size
desc: The size of the icon.

name: ReVoiceMeAppBar
desc: The app bar for the ReVoiceMe app.

name: ReVoiceMeAppBar
desc: Creates a new ReVoiceMeAppBar instance.

name: inferIndicatorColor
desc:
Infer the color of the indicator depending on
whether the user is allowed to toggle the voice changing.

name: inferIndicatorIcon
desc: Infer the icon to show for indicating the voice changing state.

name: inferTitle
desc: Infer the title of the app bar from the current route.

name: onPressed
desc:
Function to call when the microphone icon is pressed.
Attempts to toggle the voice changing state depending on whether
the user is allowed to toggle the voice changing and whether voice changing is active.

name: preferredSize
desc: Change the app bar height to be more visually appealing.

name: ReVoiceMeDrawer
desc: The drawer for the ReVoiceMe app for navigating between screens.

name: ReVoiceMeDrawer
desc: Creates a new ReVoiceMeDrawer instance.

name: cleanup
desc:
A cleanup method that is called when navigating away from the screen via the drawer.
It is called before the new screen is built (and before the current screen is disposed).

name: router
desc: The router for the different screens of the ReVoiceMe app.

name: routes
desc:
Static data about the routes of the ReVoiceMe app.
Contains the path, text and icon for each route.

name: SmallPadder
desc: A widget to apply uniformly sized padding in the app where needed.

name: SmallPadder
desc: Creates a new SmallPadder instance.

name: VoiceChangeDemo
desc: A concept demonstration for the voice changing feature.

name: VoiceChangeDemo
desc:
Creates a new VoiceChangeDemo instance.
Couples together VoiceChangeDemoEvent and VoiceChangeDemoState.
Defines the logic to execute between receiving events and emitting states.

name: maxVolume
desc: The maximum volume of the device.

name: AllowToggle
desc: The event to allow toggling the voice changing.

name: DisallowToggle
desc: The event to disallow toggling the voice changing.

name: Dispose
desc: The event to dispose the audio sessions.

name: Init
desc: The event to initialize the audio sessions.

name: StartChanging
desc: The event to start changing the voice.

name: StopChanging
desc: The event to stop changing the voice.

name: VoiceChangeDemoEvent
desc: The (abstract) class for all events in VoiceChangeDemo.

name: VoiceChangeDemoEvent
desc: Creates a new instance of VoiceChangeDemoEvent.

name: VoiceChangeDemoState
desc: The state model of VoiceChangeDemo.

name: VoiceChangeDemoState
desc: Creates a new instance of VoiceChangeDemoState.

name: isChangingVoice
desc: Whether the voice is being changed.

name: isInitialized
desc: Whether the audio sessions are initialized.

name: isToggleAllowed
desc: Whether the user is allowed to toggle voice changing.

name: DoubleCallback
desc: A callback function that accepts a double value.

name: VoiceChangerSlider
desc: A widget for controlling a certain voice changing parameter via a user controllable slider.

name: VoiceChangerSlider
desc: Creates a new VoiceChangerSlider widget.

name: delta
desc: The step size of the slider.

name: labelBuilder
desc: A function that builds the display text above the handle of the slider.

name: max
desc: The maximum value of the slider (right end).

name: min
desc: The minimum value of the slider (left end).

name: onChanged
desc: The action that should be performed when the user changes the slider.

name: title
desc: The title of this widget. It is displayed above the slider.

name: togglable
desc: Whether the slider can be toggled on or off by a switch ('false' by default).

name: value
desc: The current value.
